website_summaries.verdict: Offers a combination of nice features, fast charging, and some compatibility and durability concerns.
pros: Has a slim build and charges fast
Won't overheat, as it has reliable shutoff function that kicks in when devices are charged
cons: Some reports of lemons that failed to charge after several uses
Not compatible with all Apple devices

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for three weeks, and I really like it. Unfortunately, some reviews say that it does charge Apple AirPods. Please be aware it does NOT charge apple airpods. Charges my Apple Watch series 2 and iPhone XS Max quick and reliably. Small blue lights for charging are bothersome at times at nights, but I covered them with electrical. Not attractive, but effective. Overall not a bad product and one of the best priced chargers on the market.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schnell

customer_reviews.title: Great Way To Consolidate

customer_reviews.title: Risk of Series 4 battery issues......
customer_reviews.text: The product is listed as compatible with the Series 4 Apple Watch. This is incorrect. I purchased 2. One for my Series 1 Watch and one for my wife’s Series 4 Watch. It works with my Series 1 and all the wireless charging phones we have but this charger is Not compatible with the Apple Series 4 Watch.
